member.summary: Posts a Run object to Speedrun.com. Authentication is required for this action.
member.param: The ID of the category.
The ID of the platform.
Optional. If included, dictates the ID of the level.
Optional. If included, dictates the date of the run.
Optional. If included, dictates the ID of the region.
Optional. If included, dictates real time.
Optional. If included, dictates Real Time without loads.
Optional. If included, dictates in game time.
Optional. If included, dictates whether the run was performed on emulator.
Optional. If included, dictates the URI of the video.
Optional. If included, dictates the comment of the run.
Optional. If included, dictates the URI of the Splits.IO page for the run.
Optional. If included, dictates the variable values for the run.
Optional. If included, dictates whether the run is verified automatically upon submitting.
Optional. If included, dictates whether the run submission process is simulated.
